description:
Great package for emulation. Better than the mess that is installed all over the place by Emudeck.

That being said. external controllers don't work. I cant play without an external controller on my big screen TV like I do with emudeck. also Wii U emulator is missing (cemu). will stick to Emudeck for now but keeping an eye on this wonderful project until it's complete
Despite having a rom folder for the Wii U, and support for it in the library, there is no actual emulator installed for it.
Have used it from before it was released on flathub. Works out of the box!
Dolphin doesn't come with pre-configured gamepad settings, so is essentially useless in Game Mode. Otherwise it's a nice enough front end and launcher.
I quickly set up a few consoles to play with. Anyone with basic emulator experience should be able to set this up with ease. Thank you, this is an awesome addition to my Deck!
Downloaded to compare to emudeck, initial impressions are good. My games all work, and everything is kept nice and organized.

I love how retrodeck makes your system or deck feel like something built for only emulation. But there many problems currently. My biggest problem is you have to install it on the same device with your roms. The other is currently there are three websites that have any information for you. If you have any question, just go to the discord server. 			https://discord.gg/aMNKgRR6KG
